dbAccess

Class OrderMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbAccess.OrderMapper

  • public class OrderMapper
extends Object
    Gives access to the tables customercalculations, orders, lineitems and products.

    • Method Detail

      • getProduct

        public static LineItem getProduct(int productID)
                           throws CarportException
        Finds a LineItem in the products table in the database. The product/LineItem is used in the calculator classes.
        Parameters:
        productID - int type always 1 or higher and should match one of the existing productID's.
        Returns:
        a LineItem entity type with the given productID.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch the product from the products table.

      • addCustCalc

        public static void addCustCalc(int length,
                               int width,
                               int angle,
                               int shedLength,
                               int shedWidth)
                        throws CarportException
        Inserts a calculation of a carport to the database. Every time someone make a calculation on the site, it will be inserted into the customercalculations table.
        Parameters:
        length - type int cannot be 0
        width - type int cannot be 0
        angle - type int can be 0 if no angle is wanted
        shedLength - type int can be 0 if no shed is wanted
        shedWidth - type int can be 0 if no shed is wanted
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying ot insert the calculations into the database.

      • getCustCalcs

        public static ArrayList<CustomerCalculation> getCustCalcs()
                                                   throws CarportException
        Makes a list of all calculations from the customercalculations table.
        Returns:
        a list of calculations that has ever been made.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch all the calculations from the database.

      • addRequest

        public static void addRequest(int customerID,
                              int length,
                              int width,
                              int angle,
                              int shedLength,
                              int shedWidth,
                              int price)
                       throws CarportException
        Inserts an order request into the database. With the given parameters a new request is inserted into the orders table.
        Parameters:
        customerID - int type always 1 or higher, matching the customer currently logged in.
        length - int type
        width - int type
        angle - int type
        shedLength - int type
        shedWidth - int type
        price - int type. Total price estimate of the request.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong when inserting the request.

      • getOpenRequests

        public static List<Order> getOpenRequests()
                                   throws CarportException
        Gets a list of all requests from the database. All order requests from the database will be found with the boolean order_placed in the orders table.
        Returns:
        a list of all requests in the database, that is not placed yet.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch all requests from the database.

      • getOrders

        public static List<Order> getOrders()
                             throws CarportException
        Gets a list of all orders from the database. All orders from the database will be found with the boolean order_placed in the orders table.
        Returns:
        a list of all orders in the database, that is a placed order.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch all orders from the database.

      • editRequest

        public static void editRequest(int orderID,
                               int length,
                               int width,
                               int angle,
                               int shedLength,
                               int shedWidth,
                               int price)
                        throws CarportException
        Updates an order from the database orders table. Finds a specific order with the unique orderID and updates it with the new paramaters in the database.
        Parameters:
        orderID - int type. Is unique to 1 order, and is always 1 or higher.
        length - int type
        width - int type
        angle - int tyep
        shedLength - int type
        shedWidth - int type
        price - int type
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to update the order.

      • getCustomerOrders

        public static List<Order> getCustomerOrders(int customerID)
                                     throws CarportException
        Gets a list of all orders/requests that a specific customer has placed.
        Parameters:
        customerID - int type that matches an existing customer.
        Returns:
        a list of orders/requests to be displayed in customerview.jsp
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch all orders.

      • addBomToOrder

        public static void addBomToOrder(List<LineItem> listToBeSaved,
                                 int orderID,
                                 int empID)
                          throws CarportException
        Sets an order to placed and insets a bill of material to the database. When the request has been paid for, the boolean order_placed is changed to 1 on the given order, in the orders table. A salesman's ID will also be added to the order, to display which salesman has managed the order. Furthermore lineitems will be added to the lineitems table.
        Parameters:
        listToBeSaved - bill of material being added as lineitems in the database. Not null!
        orderID - int type and matches an existing order request in the orders table.
        empID - int type. Matches an existing employee from the employees table.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to update orders table or inserting into the lineitems table.

      • getFinalBom

        public static List<LineItem> getFinalBom(int orderID)
                                  throws CarportException
        Makes a list of LineItems to display the final bill of material.
        Parameters:
        orderID - int type. Is unique to a single order in the database.
        Returns:
        a list of LineItems connected to an order.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch the lineitems or products.

      • updateTotalPrice

        public static void updateTotalPrice(int price,
                                    int orderID)
                             throws CarportException
        Update the total price of an order.
        Parameters:
        price - int type. Comes from an inputfrom.
        orderID - int type. Matches an existing order. Always 1 or higher.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to update the price in the orders table.

      • PayForOrder

        public static void PayForOrder(int orderID)
                        throws CarportException
        Updates the order to payed. With the parameter the order's order_placed is changed to 2, to show that it has been paid for.
        Parameters:
        orderID - type int. Matches an existing order.
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to update the order.

      • getOrder

        public static Order getOrder(int orderID)
                      throws CarportException
        Finds a specific order from the database. With the given parameter, a unique order should be fetched from the database orders table.
        Parameters:
        orderID - int type. Is a unique number matching a specific order.
        Returns:
        Order entity with the given orderID from the orders table
        Throws:
        CarportException - if something goes wrong trying to fetch the order from the database.
